instructions.title: How To Delete Your Under Armour Record Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Under Armour Record Account is Easy.  You can do so from your mobile device.  To complete deletion please follow the steps below.
instructions.after: Please note, deleting this account will delete all profiles for MapMyRun, MapMyWalk, MapMy Ride, MayMyFitness, MayMyHike, and/or MapMyDogWalk.  This action action will not impact your profiles for MyFitnessPal or the UA shop app.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Deleting your Under Armour Record Account will not only Delete that account but it will delete all profiles for MapMyRun, MapMyWalk, MapMy Ride, MayMyFitness, MayMyHike, and/or MapMyDogWalk.  It will not impact your profiles for MyFitnessPal or the UA shop app.

slides.alt: Under Armour Record Account-Delete Account from iOS. Step 1: Open Under Armour Record Account
slides.title: Open App

slides.alt: Under Armour Record Account-Delete Account from iOS. Step 2: Tap More on Bottom Right
slides.title: More

slides.alt: Under Armour Record Account-Delete Account from iOS. Step 3: Tap Settings
slides.title: Settings

slides.alt: Under Armour Record Account-Delete Account from iOS. Step 4: Tap Help
slides.title: Help

slides.alt: Under Armour Record Account-Delete Account from iOS. Step 5: Tap Delete Account
slides.title: Delete Account

slides.alt: Under Armour Record Account-Delete Account from iOS. Step 6: Enter Password and Tap Next
slides.title: Password
